item.title: 进口商努力转售陷入中国关税战火的加拿大菜籽粕
item.description: 三位贸易消息人士称，在中国政府对富含蛋白质的加拿大菜籽粕征收高额进口关税后，进口商正在努力转售运抵中国的几批加拿大菜籽粕。【原文：Importers are struggling to resell several cargoes of Canadian canola meal that arrived in China after Beijing imposed hefty import tariffs on the protein-rich ingredient, three trade sources said.】

item.title: 供应增加，夏季需求结束，油价结构收窄，溢价下降
item.description: 交易商和分析师周四表示，随着夏季需求高峰的结束，中东、拉丁美洲和欧洲的产量不断增加，与未来几个月相比，全球即时基准油价的溢价正在下降。【原文：Premiums for prompt benchmark oil prices globally are falling compared with those in future months on rising output from the Middle East, Latin America and Europe, just as peak summer demand ends, traders and analysts said on Thursday.】

item.title: 安托法加斯塔上半年核心盈利增长近 60
item.description: 智利矿业公司安托法加斯塔（Antofagasta）周四公布，由于铜产量和销售量增加，半年核心盈利增长近 60%。【原文：Chilean miner Antofagasta posted a nearly 60% increase in half-year core earnings on Thursday, on higher production and sales of its copper.】

item.title: 嘉士伯上半年业绩不及预期，警告今年将面临困境
item.description: 周四，嘉士伯未能达到半年利润和销量预期，这家丹麦啤酒酿造商警告称，预计 2025 年余下时间的消费环境不会有任何改善。【原文：Carlsberg missed half-year profit and volume forecasts on Thursday, with the Danish brewer warning it does not expect any improvement in the consumer environment for the rest of 2025.】

item.title: 赫伯罗特上半年净利润下降 3.1%，下调全年最高预期
item.description: 德国集装箱航运公司赫伯罗特（Hapag-Lloyd）是全球第五大集装箱航运公司，该公司周四公布上半年净收入下降 3.1%，降至 7.09 亿欧元（8.29 亿美元），并以地缘政治不确定性为由下调了全年盈利预期区间的上限。【原文：German container shipping company Hapag-Lloyd , the world's fifth largest, on Thursday posted a 3.1% decline in its first-half net income to 709 million euros ($829 million) and brought down the top of its full-year earnings forecast range, citing geopolitical uncertainty.】

item.title: WhatsApp 称俄罗斯试图封杀它
item.description: WhatsApp 表示，俄罗斯之所以试图封锁其服务，是因为 Meta Platforms 旗下的社交媒体消息应用为人们提供了安全通信的权利，并誓言将继续努力在俄罗斯提供加密服务。【原文：WhatsApp said Russia was trying to block its services because the social media messaging app owned by Meta Platforms offered people's right to secure communication, and vowed to continue trying to make encrypted services available in Russia.】

item.title: 特朗普关税引发不确定性，蒂森克虏伯下调销售展望和投资额
item.description: 德国企业集团蒂森克虏伯（Thyssenkrupp）周四下调了全年投资和销售展望，指责美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的进口关税扰乱了全球汽车、机械和建材贸易，导致产品需求疲软。【原文：German conglomerate Thyssenkrupp cut its full-year outlook for investments and sales on Thursday, blaming weak demand for its products as U.S. President Donald Trump's import tariffsdisrupt global trade of autos, machines and building materials.】

item.title: 机器人技术和木材能否解决英国的住房问题？
item.description: 由人工智能控制的巨大机械臂在英国牛津郡的一家大型工厂里滑行，用木材（世界上最古老的建筑材料之一）制作建筑框架。【原文：Gigantic robot arms controlled by artificial intelligence glide around a vast factory in Oxfordshire, England, making building frames from timber, one of the world's oldest construction materials.】

item.title: 聚焦："特斯拉之耻 "绕过挪威，尽管马斯克的政治立场使销量猛增
item.description: 和许多挪威人一样，埃斯彭-莱斯霍尔姆最近并不喜欢埃隆-马斯克，他对这位世界首富在右翼政治中的迷失感到不安。【原文：Like many Norwegians, Espen Lysholm is not a fan of Elon Musk these days, uncomfortable with the world's richest man's lurch into right-wing politics.】

item.title: 投资者对欧洲央行利率采取 "长期看高 "的观点
item.description: 投资者对欧元区利率 "长期走高 "环境的定价越来越高，3 月份可能的降息被视为借贷利率回升至 2% 以上之前的暂时昙花一现。【原文：Investors are increasingly pricing in a "higher for longer" interest rate environment in the euro zone, with a potential cut in March seen as a temporary blip before borrowing rates climb back above 2%.】

item.title: 早间竞价比特币加入风险狂欢
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 彭博新闻社：中印两国正就时隔五年恢复边境贸易进行谈判
item.description: 彭博新闻社周四援引熟悉此事的新德里官员的话称，印度和中国正在讨论恢复时隔五年多的国内商品边境贸易。【原文：India and China are discussing resuming border trade of domestic goods after more than five years, Bloomberg News said on Thursday, citing officials in New Delhi familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：DeepSeek 因华为芯片问题推迟推出新人工智能模型
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，中国人工智能公司DeepSeek在使用华为芯片训练失败后推迟了其新模型的发布，这凸显了中国政府推动取代美国技术的局限性。【原文：Chinese artificial intelligence company DeepSeek has delayed the release of its new model after failing to train it using Huawei's chips, highlighting the limits of Beijing's push to replace U.S. technology, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国将探索与巴基斯坦在关键矿产和碳氢化合物方面的合作
item.description: 国务卿马可-鲁比奥在国务院于巴基斯坦独立日发表的声明中表示，华盛顿期待与巴基斯坦在关键矿产和碳氢化合物方面开展合作。【原文：Secretary of State Marco Rubio said Washington looked forward to exploring cooperation with Pakistan on critical minerals and hydrocarbons, with his comments coming in a statement issued by the State Department on Pakistan's Independence Day.】

item.title: 美联储降息鼓点敲响，美元回落；亚洲股市喘息
item.description: 周四，美元承压，交易员们纷纷押注美联储将在下个月继续降息，推动比特币创下历史新高，而地区股市的强劲反弹也为美元提供了喘息的机会。【原文：The U.S. dollar was under pressure on Thursday as traders piled into wagers that the Federal Reserve will resume cutting interest rates next month, powering Bitcoin to a record high, while a blistering rally in regional stocks took a breather.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 7 月就业反弹，失业率大幅下降
item.description: 周四的数据显示，由于企业招聘了更多的全职员工，澳大利亚7月份的就业率出现反弹，失业率从3年半的高位回落，平息了人们对劳动力市场即将崩溃的担忧。【原文：Australian employment rebounded in July as firms took on more full-time workers, data showed on Thursday, pulling the jobless rate down from a 3-1/2 year high and calming concerns the labour market was about to fall over.】

item.title: 锂矿反弹有望为陷入困境的澳大利亚矿商带来喘息机会
item.description: 消息人士和分析师表示，近期锂价格的反弹可能会缓解澳大利亚一些陷入困境的生产商的压力，这些生产商一直在努力减少电池材料的风险敞口，从而促使他们放弃出售一些项目的计划。【原文：A recent rally in lithium prices could ease pressure on some beleaguered producers in Australia who have been trying to shrink exposure to the battery material, prompting them to drop plans to sell some projects, sources and analysts said.】

item.title: 负责监督 Citgo 拍卖的法院官员要求推迟拍卖听证会
item.description: 周三的一份法院文件显示，特拉华州负责监督委内瑞拉炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 母公司股份拍卖的一名法院官员要求推迟原定于下周举行的最后听证会，以决定拍卖的胜出者。【原文：A court officer in Delaware overseeing an auction of shares in the parent of Venezuela-owned refiner Citgo Petroleum has requested an adjournment of the sale process' final hearing, originally scheduled for next week to decide the auction's winner, a court filing showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普与普京会晤前，石油从两个月低点回升
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京即将举行会晤，市场风险溢价上升，油价周四走高，在前一交易日遭到抛售后收复失地。【原文：Oil prices edged higher on Thursday, regaining ground after a sell-off in the previous session, with the upcoming meeting between U.S. President Donald Trump and his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin raising risk premiums in the market.】

item.title: 中国投资者关注印尼，以规避美国关税并开拓当地市场
item.description: 高晓宇是雅加达一家工业用地咨询公司的创始人，他接到了大量中国公司的电话，这些公司急于在印尼扩张或建立业务，试图避免被美国征收高额进口关税。【原文：Gao Xiaoyu, the founder of an industrial land consulting firm in Jakarta, has been inundated with calls from Chinese companies eager to expand or set up operations in Indonesia as they try to shield themselves from the United States' hefty import tariffs.】

item.title: 派拉蒙的新东家将增加电影制作，保留有线电视网络
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）周三公布计划，将保留并发展其支柱娱乐品牌 Nickelodeon、MTV 和 BET，同时在以 84 亿美元与 Skydance Media 合并后大幅增加故事片的制作。【原文：Paramount Global unveiled plans on Wednesday to retain and develop its stalwart entertainment brands Nickelodeon, MTV, and BET, while sharply increasing feature film production following its $8.4 billion merger with Skydance Media.】

item.title: 美联储降息押注升温，美元陷入低迷；比特币飙升至历史新高
item.description: 由于交易商加大了对美联储下月继续降息的押注，美元兑欧元和英镑周四在数周低点附近徘徊。【原文：The dollar languished near multi-week lows against the euro and sterling on Thursday as traders ramped up bets for the Federal Reserve to resume cutting interest rates next month.】

item.title: 比特币创下新纪录，美联储宽松政策押注为其带来更多利好
item.description: 比特币周四创下历史新高，原因是人们对美联储采取更宽松货币政策的预期不断增强，加上最近宣布的金融改革带来的利好。【原文：Bitcoin hit a record high on Thursday as increasing expectations for easier monetary policy from the Federal Reserve added to tailwinds from recently announced financial reforms.】

item.title: 贝森特在接受彭博社采访时称日本在货币紧缩方面 "落后于曲线
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）在接受彭博电视采访时表示，日本在处理货币紧缩政策方面姗姗来迟。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said Japan is being late in handling monetary tightening during an interview with Bloomberg Television.】

item.title: 澳大利亚起诉美世保险公司，指控其未报告会员服务违规行为
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监管机构周四表示，已将养老基金美世超级养老金公司告上法庭，指控该公司未披露对重大会员服务失误的调查，包括向已故会员错误退还保险金。【原文：Australia's corporate regulator said on Thursday it had taken pension fund Mercer Super to court, alleging it failed to disclose investigations into major member service failures, including wrong insurance refunds to deceased members.】

item.title: 中国个人电脑制造商联想集团第一季度利润翻番，收入增长 22
item.description: 中国联想集团周四公布，尽管面临美国关税政策的挑战，但第一季度利润仍增长了108%。【原文：China's Lenovo on Thursday reported a 108% rise in first-quarter profit despite challenges from U.S. tariff policies.】

item.title: 聚焦：中国制药企业转向本地试剂供应商以降低成本和缩短交货时间
item.description: 业内高管和经理表示，中国的制药研发公司越来越有兴趣从本地生产商采购被称为试剂的关键耗材，因为他们希望降低成本，缩短交货时间。【原文：Pharmaceutical research and development firms in China are increasingly interested in procuring critical supplies known as reagents from local manufacturers, industry executives and managers said, as they seek to cut costs and delivery times.】

item.title: 香港企业集团公布业绩，长江和记港口交易成为焦点
item.description: 长江和记将于本周四公布中期业绩，投资者将期待长江和记就其向美国投资公司贝莱德（BlackRock）牵头的财团出售港口业务的情况发表评论。【原文：Investors will look for comments from CK Hutchison on the status of its ports business sale to a consortium led by U.S. investment firm BlackRock when the Hong Kong conglomerate reports its interim results on Thursday.】

item.title: 路透社民意调查显示，四分之三的日本企业看好美国贸易协议
item.description: 路透社周四的一项调查显示，在东京设法从美国总统唐纳德-特朗普那里获得一些让步之后，四分之三的日本企业对与美国达成的最新关税协议持积极态度。【原文：Three-quarters of Japanese firms have a favourable view of the latest tariff deal with the United States after Tokyo managed to draw some concessions from President Donald Trump, a Reuters survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 新加坡淡马锡发行 15 亿美元定息和浮息债券
item.description: 新加坡国家投资者淡马锡公司[RIC:RIC:TEM.UL]周四称，该公司旗下部门在其250亿美元中期票据计划启动发行一天后，定价发行了两笔总额为15亿美元的美元债券。【原文：Singapore's state investor Temasek [RIC:RIC:TEM.UL] said on Thursday its unit priced two U.S. dollar-denominated bonds totaling $1.5 billion, a day after launching the offer under its $25 billion medium-term note program.】
